title: Franchise value of the Oakland Raiders ( NFL ) 2002 to 2019
yAxis: Franchise value in million U.S. dollars
summary: In general Franchise value in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Franchise value in million U.S. dollars is roughly increasing from 2005 to 2006, roughly constant from 2006 to 2013, and finally gradually increasing from 2013 to 2017.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2015 and 2016.
The highest Franchise value in million U.S. dollars, of value 2380.0 was reached at Year 2017
Minimum Franchise value in million U.S. dollars about 676.0 was reached at Year 2005
